definition: to engage in plotting or enter into a conspiracy, swear together
details:
verb
- to engage in plotting or enter into a conspiracy, swear together
= example: to engage in plotting or enter into a conspiracy, swear together
= synonyms: cabal
- to act in unison or agreement and in secret towards a deceitful or illegal purpose
= example: to act in unison or agreement and in secret towards a deceitful or illegal purpose
= synonyms: collude
